title: UKPackEase - 458ml Plastic Takeaway Food Prep Container - Microwave and Dishwasher Safe - Ideal for Food Takeaway and Meal Prep (16.12oz, Miami Blue, Pack of 10)
features: 🍱 Perfect Portion Control – 458ml Capacity Our container measures 17.2cm x 11.5cm x 4.1cm and holds 458ml — the perfect size for snacks, mixed nuts and dried fruit, small meals, or portioned sides. Ideal for meal prep, calorie tracking, and packing lunches for kids.

♨️ Microwave, Freezer & Dishwasher Safe Engineered to handle extreme temperatures from -20°C to +100°C. Whether you’re freezing leftovers, reheating lunch, or tossing them in the dishwasher, these containers do it all.
🧊 Stackable Space Saver With their compact, stackable design, these containers help you save precious fridge, freezer, or cabinet space. Organise your kitchen and streamline your meal prep routine.
🌱 Eco-Friendly & Safe Made from 100% recyclable PP plastic. These containers are safe for you and the planet – a sustainable choice for everyday food storage.

🔒 Tamper-Evident Snap Seal – One-Time Use Designed with a secure, single-use snap-lock mechanism that ensures product integrity. Once sealed, the lid cannot be reopened without visible damage—providing peace of mind for safe, hygienic food delivery or retail sales. Ideal for takeout, pre-packed meals, or commercial use where tamper protection is a must.
